metadata.name: Cyberflower
metadata.description:
This piece is to give some love to the community in these times. First of all the subject matter with the flower is virtual flowers for everyone

Second it becomes flowers for everyone as soon as some one wins the action and gets the token.  Then the rights becomes CC0 and anyone can use this piece

Also celebrates the power in owning your own contract and doing it trough ways such as manifold

Captured in Uppsala, Sweden

Dimensions 3400x4250
